name: Cruz Rosario
text: I sent my friends to this place with my warmest recommendations. I  go to this restaurant often. This recommendation is always successful. The dishes they serve are delicious and the team is very friendly and cooperative. Every time  we visit this place we enjoy a delightful time.  I recommend this place with pleasure.
